dt: {bc}an easy natural gait of a horse resembling a canter
{bc}an easy usually bounding gait capable of being sustained for a long time

et: Middle English {it}loup, lope{/it} leap, probably from Old Norse {it}hlaup{/it}; akin to Old English {it}hlēapan{/it} to leap {ma}{mat|leap|}{/ma}

dt: {bc}to move or ride at a lope

dt: Mário (Alberto Nobre Lopes) 1924–2017 prime minister of Portugal (1976–78; 1983–85) and president (1986–96)
